text: Joined Senate colleagues on a bipartisan letter to Secretary Pompeo this week about the Trump Administration’s abandonment of the refugee admissions program. This is an unprecedented move as the world faces a refugee crisis unlike it has ever seen. https://t.co/SidhtcsdPe

Reminder: tomorrow is National #DrugTakeBackDay. Encouraging all Illinoisans who have leftover prescription drugs to responsibly dispose of them. Find a collocation site near you: https://t.co/wWEdTEsGLz

This is a downright disgrace. Once again, the Rauner and Trump Administrations prioritized public relations over a serious public health hazard. They must come clean. Illinoisans deserve better than this. https://t.co/Bm1Y3O6SXr

Joined @SenMarkey and colleagues today in urging the Trump Administration to not rollback fuel emissions standards. Doing so would harm consumers and release more pollution into the air that drives climate change. https://t.co/hI45aSfvQN

This is why I called for Scott Lloyd to be replaced in July with someone who is capable of actually reuniting the families separated by the Trump Administration. No one has been held accountable for this unmitigated disaster that has stained our nation. https://t.co/92iHG8EVA4

I commend the FBI for quickly identifying and apprehending the mail bombing suspect. This act of domestic terrorism should serve as a warning that elected officials have a responsibility to avoid inflammatory rhetoric that encourages violence.

My heart breaks for Pittsburgh today and the Jewish community that worships at Tree of Life Congregation Synagogue. I’m praying for the families who have lost loved ones, and for those injured in this senseless tragedy including several police officers.
It’s past time to end U.S. military and taxpayer support of Saudi Arabia’s disastrous war in Yemen. A staggering loss of innocent life. https://t.co/QugLYQwje0

I'm grieving with the Jewish community in Pittsburgh, but those of us who serve in Congress must offer more than thoughts & prayers. We must unequivocally condemn anti-Semitism & all forms of bigotry. There’s only one legitimate side in this debate & we must unite against hate.

I stand in solidarity with my good friends at @HIASrefugees. They responded to the rejection of Jewish refugees during the Holocaust by leading America to a more welcoming approach to refugees. They are acting on their faith and fighting for American values.

Here’s how the newly signed bipartisan opioids bill will help make a difference as we fight this epidemic. The bill includes many priorities I helped author, like funding to help children and families cope with serious traumatic experiences. https://t.co/9jM3OFBiL0
Reminder: if you need individual market health insurance for next year, open enrollment begins this week on Thursday, November 1st. Here’s how you can #GetCovered: https://t.co/rW86Mg65fH

Glad to join leaders at @advocatehealth today for the opening of their new Trauma Recovery Center. With the help of federal funding, this center will provide trauma-informed counseling and case management services for victims of violence. https://t.co/0B4ZIazIov

As this article points out about President Trump's health care plan:

1. There is no health care “plan”
2. He's expanded junk insurance which does not cover pre-existing conditions
3. He is trying to have a court overturn protections for people with pre-existing conditions. https://t.co/L7Zb0HWe5N
AFTERNOON READ: Ana González was an unrelenting fighter for justice and democracy in Chile. May she rest in peace. https://t.co/GE0ZTjP3ry

Met with middle and high school principals and counselors today at @JolietSD86 to discuss the skyrocketing rates of teen e-cigarette use and what we can do to prevent today’s students from tobacco and nicotine addiction. https://t.co/aYzFrVFnt9
Along with @SenBlumenthal, I’m asking DNI Coats for a classified briefing on alleged Saudi threats to Jamal Khashoggi’s life before his premeditated murder https://t.co/Hvie4F0XHs

It was great to join @SenCortezMasto over the weekend to meet members of the Nicaraguan-American community in Nevada. We stand with you and will continue fighting against the Trump Administration's efforts to rescind #TPS. https://t.co/qhmkykxLXl

I’m relieved Asia Bibi has been freed and acquitted of a bogus blasphemy charge in Pakistan. This was the correct, humane, and only decision for the Court to make. Her and her family's safety - and her lawyer's - should be of the utmost importance now. https://t.co/renNtTjcuw

This tweet is a Halloween trick, not treat. 
 
In 2017, President Trump & Republicans were one vote away from ending protections for people with pre-existing conditions. Since then, his Administration has been relentless in its efforts to dismantle the Affordable Care Act. https://t.co/Mm8adqqExk

Illinoisans: The Trump Administration doesn’t seem to want you to know that tomorrow you can enroll for affordable, quality health insurance on the individual marketplace, but I do. #GetCovered here: https://t.co/IMwtmcyrRV https://t.co/QwpQUosZgu

The Trump Administration has given a shameful pass to Saudi Arabia, and has not stood up for American values abroad. Will Saudi Arabia be held accountable for its barbaric premeditated murder of Jamal Khashoggi? https://t.co/rnzlZcCGMx
Memo to President Trump: effective border security and a successful immigration policy take more than a temper tantrum and tweets.

Are you covered? Looking for a new plan? You can sign up for individual marketplace health insurance or make changes to your plan starting today. Go to https://t.co/wM43rjghRC to #GetCovered https://t.co/LrpvHLJdHF
ICYMI: Open enrollment for individual market health insurance started yesterday. Sign up for your plan and #GetCovered today here: https://t.co/wM43rjghRC https://t.co/myr4g3wqDo

This is a heart-wrenching piece by Jamal Khashoggi’s fiancee. I’ll ask it again: Will the Trump Administration defend American values and make Saudi Arabia pay a serious price for its barbaric premeditated murder of Mr. Khashoggi? https://t.co/4fi2GEKpzr

The Rauner Administration’s delay on notifying residents in Lake County about cancer-emitting chemicals from two plants is simply outrageous. Day after day, the Rauner and Trump Admins continue to prioritize public relations over serious public health hazards. https://t.co/X838UE9DEN
One week ago, the tragic shooting at the Tree of Life Synagogue in Pittsburgh revealed in heartbreaking detail the hate and latent violence that lives in the hearts of too many in this land.

In 2012, I held a hearing on the threat posed by violent white supremacists. Six years later, not nearly enough has been done to combat this peril. Congress must stop turning a blind eye and immediately pass my Domestic Terrorism Prevention Act. https://t.co/BiA6cPhqeI

Saddened to learn of the passing of Phillip Jackson, who was a tireless advocate for racial, social, and economic justice in Chicago. His passion and leadership will be greatly missed. https://t.co/yvTgsQzARE
End U.S. taxpayer and military support of the Saudi war in Yemen. There are no winners when so many innocent people are killed. https://t.co/qm0Y5DRBr0

.@SenDuckworth & I are calling on IL Director of Public Health Nirav Shah to resign. There was definitive evidence that a serious public health crisis was underway at IVH Quincy, and the Rauner Admin & Director Shah chose to sit on their hands as veterans & staff fell victim. https://t.co/37oIgfRB0v

The Trump Administration continues to do everything in its power to end #DACA and deport #Dreamers who came here as children. They have so much to contribute to the only country they call home. Congress must pass my bipartisan #DreamAct. https://t.co/ZbxMWpdgAr
Illinoisans: You can still enroll in individual health insurance under the Affordable Care Act. Start shopping for plans and #GetCovered today here: https://t.co/wM43rjghRC

President Trump and Republicans continue to try and dismantle the ACA. They don’t want you to know that enrollment for health insurance on the individual market is ongoing. #GetCovered today here: https://t.co/wM43rjghRC

AG Sessions’ forced resignation is a transparent effort to clear the way for President Trump to limit or stop the Mueller investigation. Acting AG Whitaker has made his intentions clear to do the President’s bidding and stop Mueller.

This is devastating. Yet again my heart breaks for an American community suffering from the scourge of gun violence. My prayers are with the friends and family of Sgt. Ron Helus, and the many other victims of this horrific tragedy. https://t.co/eOcFEbtjoE

Joined @ChicagosMayor yesterday for the opening of O’Hare Airport’s new ground transportation center. With the help of federal funding, this facility will improve passenger experience & create 150 new permanent jobs. https://t.co/zmSgtUpdd2

Happy to attend the grand opening of the Pullman Community Center – the latest example of the revitalization taking place in this neighborhood. Proud to support the federal tax incentive that helped make this center possible. https://t.co/4yr2odWDe2

A federal appeals court today called Pres. Trump ending DACA & deporting these young people "cruel and wasteful." Pres. Trump cannot explain this away as national security. It's a hateful policy aimed at innocent young people. Our President should remember his own family's story.

Acting AG Whitaker was clearly chosen to starve or stop the Mueller investigation. To avoid a constitutional confrontation, Whitaker must recuse himself from the Mueller probe. America’s question: is President Trump above the law?

In a democracy it takes a free press to hold politicians of both parties accountable. That’s their job and we have to respect it. When we start telling folks that they are fake or don’t pay attention to them, that discredits an important part of America’s democracy. https://t.co/DLsZRFWn0i
Great to see @Fermilab is looking to hire our veterans for positions in its technical and computing departments. Veterans bring unique skills to the workforce. https://t.co/n0qu6HwMBn

President Trump’s asylum ban is illegal & un-American. For generations our country has had a bipartisan tradition of welcoming those fleeing persecution. If the President is truly concerned about border security, he should work with Congress to pass bipartisan immigration reform. https://t.co/QQ9XC4dwMR

Illinois is lucky to have so many veterans who call our state home. They answered the call when our nation needed it most. Today - and every day - we honor them for their bravery and sacrifices. #VeteransDay https://t.co/XItPmtZBNi
My prayers are with the people of California as they battle horrific wildfires. Thankful for the bravery of our first responders. https://t.co/6jzU9EohQd

Good to be with @RepRobinKelly and many of Illinois' veterans today to take part in the Pullman National Monument #VeteransDay Commemoration. We laid a wreath to honor those who have fallen defending this great nation. We are forever in their debt. https://t.co/9imVphB2UB
An honor to join American Legion Post #758 and @ulcchicago to mark Veterans Day. https://t.co/9NQ1MzgArC

I continue to pray for the people of California, especially those who’ve lost loved ones to these deadly fires. The bravery of our first responders working tirelessly to put out these flames is truly remarkable. https://t.co/aaWUIdFzOE

Just like Big Tobacco before them, e-cigarette companies are actively targeting kids with their addictive products. They peddle kid-appealing flavors like cupcake, whipped cream, and gummy bear, everywhere, including on the internet where it’s easy for kids to buy. https://t.co/wdPYZZ6mwR

Students at 145 closed schools in Illinois are now eligible for automatic closed school discharges. Sec. DeVos must immediately provide this federal student debt relief to eligible students instead of dragging her feet. https://t.co/xIhm3NWKya
Illinoisans: If you need health insurance for 2019, ACA open enrollment only lasts a few more weeks. #GetCovered today here: https://t.co/wM43rjghRC https://t.co/pnclZhmGnM
This is the third year in a row that the FBI’s annual hate crimes report has shown an increase in hate crimes across America. We must do more to combat hateful bigotry. https://t.co/lzYk6C9If9

I am honored that the Senate Democratic Caucus has again supported me to serve as Whip. Our party is more diverse than ever, our Congress is divided, and the challenges we face are great. But we can, and must, come together to meet those challenges.
My statement with @ChuckGrassley on President Trump’s endorsement of the comprehensive #cjreform bill: https://t.co/WAb6Dy1oUJ

Great to see Representatives-Elect Garcia and Casten today and congratulate them on their victories. Looking forward to working together in the 116th Congress on behalf of Illinois. https://t.co/LzhA5hFx8J

Excited that the Senate Democratic Caucus will welcome two new senators next Congress, @RepJackyRosen and @RepSinema. It was great to see them today and I look forward to working together on the issues that matter most to Americans. https://t.co/nVJlvEhc6X
There’s still time to make changes to your health insurance plans, or sign up for 2019 coverage under the Affordable Care Act. #GetCovered today: https://t.co/wM43rjghRC https://t.co/ITn9T4iEq6
This is the best chance in a generation to make meaningful changes in our federal drug sentencing laws. We cannot squander it. https://t.co/q3kJTNBBem

At fed level, @SenDuckworth @RepSchneider @RepBillFoster & I are holding EPA accountable for not notifying residents about these dangerous emissions. Also pushing FDA to update its standards on ethylene oxide. Lake & DuPage County residents deserve better. https://t.co/miE7cJNSeU

The Trump Administration should practice what it preaches on press freedom abroad. How will countries like China and Myanmar take us seriously when we turn around and ban reporters from doing their constitutional duties? https://t.co/tkCZ0Mdwnz
Welcomed students from @IllinoisStateU, who are here in D.C. to learn more about Congress and meet with their IL elected officials. Enjoy your visit. https://t.co/ht7HHSNRRW

Forcibly repatriating Rohingya refugees to Myanmar under the current unsafe conditions would be a grave mistake. The Myanmar military has no respect for human rights, and such a move would put the Rohingya in familiar danger. https://t.co/3h3V1ch3Nc

E-cigarette use among children and teenagers is an epidemic, just ask our federal health agencies or any school teacher in America.  The FDA is finally moving in the right direction by cracking down on the sale of kid-friendly flavors in e-cigarettes and cigars. https://t.co/7GStnwT1G6

For decades, Big Tobacco has targeted menthol cigarettes to the African American community. More than 80% of African Americans who smoke cigarettes, smoke menthols. And 54% of all kids who smoke cigarettes, smoke menthols.

On National Rural Health Day, we join the 60 million Americans that live and work in rural communities to recognize the #PowerofRural. We must continue to improve health care in rural areas, not only to help the communities, but also the dedicated health providers serving them. https://t.co/U59D0LnTPp

The Senate has an extraordinary opportunity to pass a bipartisan #cjreform bill to make drug sentences fairer, relieve our overcrowded prisons, redirect funding to addiction treatment, help keep our communities safe, and restore faith in our justice system. We can't delay. https://t.co/VGJEvwNZGz

In a comment letter, @ChuckGrassley & I are supporting HHS in its rule change – that builds off our Senate-passed bill to require Big Pharma to disclose the drug’s price in their TV ads. This is about transparency & lowering costs. Share your opinion here: https://t.co/5e8HXU6jP0

The Justice Department needs to stop playing games with Byrne-JAG violence prevention funding for the City of Chicago. Yesterday I joined 36 Members of Congress and filed an amicus brief in the 7th Circuit: we support the City’s position in litigation over these critical funds.

Today I joined local advocates at @SaferFoundation in Chicago to discuss the urgency of passing the bipartisan #cjreform bill. This is an extraordinary chance to make meaningful changes in our federal drug sentencing laws and create a more equitable & fair justice system. https://t.co/qg42K92hfj
You have until December 15th to sign up for health insurance on the individual market. Find out what plans are best for you here: https://t.co/wM43rjghRC https://t.co/AZ7oZu7FGb

Today, America holds more prisoners, by far, than any other country in the world. Our overcrowded federal prisons consume one quarter of DOJ's discretionary budget. This undermines other important priorities, like preventing crime and treating drug addiction.

The Trump Administration hasn’t made Saudi Arabia pay a serious price for its premeditated actions and brutal murder of Jamal Khashoggi. Appeasing its leadership undermines American values at home and abroad. https://t.co/v2d1iI4YAm
